branchCategory.name: Fluororesin Tubing
branchCategory.description: <p>High purity fluoropolymer tubing is available as standard in metric and inch sizes.&nbsp;These series has outstanding corrosion resistance, compatible with chemicals such as acids, bases and ultrapure water.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: TIL
TL
TIH
TID
branchItem.description: TD/TID series is a highly flexible fluorine resin tubing that was designed for installation in small spaces. The denatured PTFE fluorine resin tubing was developed to realize high flexibility, while maintaining the same heat and chemical resistance as the series, TL/TH. TD/TID series is suitable for industries that require heat and chemical resistance and conforms to Food Sanitation Law.

branchItem.name: TD
branchItem.description: TD/TID series is a highly flexible fluorine resin tubing that was designed for installation in small spaces. The denatured PTFE fluorine resin tubing was developed to realize high flexibility, while maintaining the same heat and chemical resistance as the series, TL/TH. TD/TID series is suitable for industries that require heat and chemical resistance and conforms to Food Sanitation Law.

branchItem.name: TH
TILM
branchItem.description: The TILM is an advanced flexible, heat and chemical resistant tubing that is compatible with a wide range of fluids, and can resist temperatures up to 500°F. This tubing comes in four colors – red, black, blue and translucent.  In addition, the size and length variations have been extended allowing you to select exactly what is needed in 9 inch size options. The TILM can also be ordered in seven different lengths from 2 meters straight type up to 100 meter rolls. Developed to be combined with our extensive line of fittings, the addition of the TILM tube provides a complete solution for your piping equipment needs.

branchItem.name: TLM
branchItem.description: The TLM is an advanced flexible, heat and chemical resistant tubing that is compatible with a wide range of fluids, and can resist temperatures up to 260°C. The TLM comes in four colors – red, black, blue and translucent.  What is more, we have extended the size and length variations so customers can select exactly what they need in 13 metric size options. It can also be ordered in seven different lengths from 2 meters straight type up to 100 meter rolls. Developed to be combined with our extensive line of fittings, the addition of the TLM tube provides customers with a complete solution for their piping equipment needs.

branchItem.name: TQ
branchItem.description: SMC's 2-layer soft fluropolymer tubing, series TQ, has a special nylon resin outer layer and an inner layer of special fluropolymer.  The internal smoothness of the TQ's inner layer is equivalent to Ra 0.02µm, and because the TQ is translucent it helps in identifying fluid color. Compared to SMC's TL series, flexibility has been improved by up to 55%, and the weight has been reduced by approximately 44%. The TQ is an excellent choice for use in automobile, semiconductor, food, medical and machine tool industries.
